players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him."
Bob: "Be careful, Charlie. I might not be the mafioso as I claimed, but I know something about you."
Charlie: "I am innocent. I was not the one who killed Diana."
You: "I have evidence that Bob is the mafioso. I will continue to investigate Charlie and remain vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
